alert.note: Alert for Joshua Tree NP East; Joshua Tree NP West (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 05 at 3:52PM PDT by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of San Bernardino and Riverside Counties through 430 PM PDT... At 347 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Twentynine Palms, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Lightning, locally heavy rain, and strong winds will make outdoor recreation unsafe in northwest portions of Joshua Tree National Park. Locations impacted include... Indian Cove, Park Boulevard, and the North Entrance. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, seek shelter inside a vehicle or building if available.

area.areaDesc: Joshua Tree NP East; Joshua Tree NP West
